mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_products_tb(quantity, price, product_id, product_name, order_id, created_at) values(#{quantity},#{price},#{productId},#{productName}, #{orderId},now())
mapper.update: UPDATE order_products_tb SET quantity = #{quantity}, price = #{price}, product_id = #{productId}, product_name = #{productName}, WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE order_products_tb SET price ={price} WHERE order_id =#{orderId}
UPDATE order_tb SET status="취소 요청" WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.select: select op.order_id,pi.image, op.price, op.quantity, op.product_name, s.second_category_name, o.state,op.id as productId from order_products_tb op left join product_tb p on op.product_id = p.id left join product_image_tb pi on p.id = pi.product_id left join second_category_tb s on p.second_category_id = s.id left join first_category_tb f on s.first_category_id = f.id left join order_tb o on o.id = op.order_id where op.order_id = #{orderId} and pi.is_thumbnail = 1 group by op.id;
select p.name, p.address, p.phone_number, p.email from person_tb p left join user_tb u on p.user_id = u.id left join order_tb o on u.id = o.user_id where o.id = #{orderId}
SELECT * FROM order_products_tb WHERE order_id =#{orderId} AND product_id = #{productId};
